Recursion
========================================================

```{r}
addEm<-function(v){
  sum <- 0
  for(k in 1:length(v)){
    sum <- sum+v[k]
  }
  sum(v)
  return(sum)
}
```

```{r}
newAddEm <-function(v){
  # Base Case
  if (length(v)==0) return(0)
      return( v[1] + newAddEm(v[-1]))
  }
```
